summary: Gaming store website for Dragon Games Store - a digital gaming marketplace with 3+ years experience and 5,600+ customers. White background with black text theme, horizontal layout with game catalog featuring images, trailers, descriptions, and prices. Blue and white 'Buy Now' buttons redirect to WhatsApp for purchases. Includes search functionality for games.
architectural_notes: White background with black text theme throughout
Support for game platforms: PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox

existing_features.title: Design a horizontal layout website with white background and black text throughout as the base theme
Create a header with a DGS logo that displays 'DGS' text in black on a white background as the profile picture

Display an 'About Us' section with the provided description highlighting 3+ years experience, 5,600+ customer base, 24/7 support, platform availability (PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox), and the complete 'Why Choose Dragon Games Store' content

Implement a game catalog grid with both horizontal scrolling for each row and vertical scrolling for multiple rows, displaying game cards with image, name, trailer video embed (if available), description, and platform tag
Add a 'SALE!' badge on top of each game card with blue background and white text when the game's onSale flag is true
Display the game price in the top right corner of each game card in large, highly visible text showing '₹[amount]/- only' format in black text on white background
Add a 'Buy Now' button on each game card with blue background and white text that redirects to WhatsApp chat at https://wa.me/918757242955 when clicked
Create an admin interface to add, edit, and delete games from the catalog with fields for name, price, description, image URL, trailer video URL, platform selection, and sale status toggle
Display the generated Dragon Games Store logo in the header
Update the WhatsApp contact number from 918757242955 to 918757242995 in all Buy Now button links throughout the website
Add a search bar with a search icon at the top of the page that allows users to filter games by name in real-time
